meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vertical.
meanings.sent1: The verticalnesses of the skyscraper made it stand out in the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the painting's verticalnesses to make sure it hung straight on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The verticalnesses of the tree made it look like it was reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent4: The verticalnesses of the mountain was awe-inspiring, towering over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The verticalnesses of the waterfall created a stunning display of nature's power.

meanings.sent1: The verticalnesses of the flagpole made it easy to spot from a distance.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the verticalnesses of the blinds to control the amount of sunlight in the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat's verticalnesses as it climbed the tree was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The verticalnesses of the rocket as it launched into the sky was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The verticalnesses of the cliff made it a challenging climb for experienced hikers.
